title: Interpretation of seeing walking barefoot in a dream is a comprehensive interpretation for an unmarried woman

preview.html:
Interpretation of walking barefoot in a dream The comprehensive interpretation of walking barefoot in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from some difficulties in his life, whether these difficulties are at work, family life, or social relationships, or that the dreamer will suffer from these problems in the coming periods. It will be difficult for him to overcome it and he will face many obstacles. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of walking barefoot in a dream, and the comprehensive interpretation for single and married women. Interpretation of the dream of seeing walking barefoot in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is walking in the street without shoes, this dream is considered a bad dream, as it shows that the dreamer is facing many difficulties in his life. He cannot achieve what he dreams of. He suffers from many problems. Difficulty at work and inability to manage his day financially. One of the most promising visions is for someone to see in his dream that he is walking barefoot and crying during his dream. Overcoming these difficulties, the dreamer should be ready to turn to God Almighty and return to Him, and pray for him to facilitate the doors of livelihood for him. Whoever sees another person walking in the street barefoot, this dream is a symbol that the person who saw him in the dream is facing some financial difficulties. And that he needs help but does not ask, which is a sign that the dreamer must give it. . for him. A helping hand. One of the bad dreams is for a sick person to see in his dream that he is walking barefoot. This dream symbolizes that the dreamer will suffer from a serious illness in the coming days or that he will not recover from this illness and will die because of it. Whoever sees in his dream that he is walking barefoot on land covered with soft sand, and the road on which he walks is paved, and there are no stones or holes. His life. Dream interpretation scholars say: Whoever sees in a dream that one of his family members is walking down the street without wearing shoes, then this dream indicates that he will leave one of the people he loves, such as separating his wife through divorce and divorce. Traveling for his wife. His family, or the death of one of his family, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing bare feet for a single woman. The interpretation of this dream of an unmarried girl varies according to the details contained in the dream: If the girl sees that she is walking barefoot, then this dream is good news that she will soon marry a good man who has good morals and fears May God Almighty deal with her, making her live in happiness and peace.
ZOE.But it is not good for a single girl to see that she is walking a very long distance and is not wearing shoes on her feet. This dream shows the bad feelings that this girl feels. She feels that she feels very lonely and wants to communicate with her. Someone who relieves her from feeling lonely. She can share life with him, but she cannot complete the connection. One of the promising visions for an unmarried girl is to see in her dream that she is walking without shoes, and she has met someone she knows, and this person has given her her shoes and she is wearing them. This dream indicates that she will You marry this. Face. And if the person who gave her the shoes was a stranger that she did not know, then this dream means that she will marry a rich man who will make her happy.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a woman married to Ibn Sirin?  Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for a married woman and a black snake in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing a snake in a dream for a married womanIn the past, a snake was seen as a sign of transformation in the dreamer's life and could symbolize overcoming obstacles and achieving goals. The correct interpretation depends on the details of the vision and some details related to the dreamerâ€™s life. What is the interpretation of a dream about a snake in a dream for a married woman? As for anxiety, there is nothing more terrifying than seeing snakes and snakes. These terrifying reptiles do not try to spread their poison into the blood of others and make them disappear, and this is the symbol that Mentioned by Islamic hermeneutics. It has been translated into many important things and points: If a married woman is suffering during this period from negative changes in the context of her family and does not know the reason for these changes, despite what she does to give everyone comfort and happiness, then she should think carefully about her closest friend in the world and. If she is truly only concerned with her own interests, or if there are secrets that she knows nothing about and may not prefer to know, regardless of the warnings and advice she sees. A snake in a dream of a woman who takes care of her home and children may represent other things that have nothing to do with the women who are trying to harm her, as It may be related to her children and her fears for their future. Which Satan is trying to spread in your soul to shake your trust in God - Glory be to Him -. It has been mentioned in the books of ancient translators that the snake can express the hidden energy within you, and if you use it correctly, you will improve your situation and overcome all the problems and difficulties that you face. A snake in a dream for a woman married to Ibn SirinIn the beginning, Ibn Sirin wonders if there are recent disagreements between the mother and a member of her family or the husbandâ€™s family, and invites her to think of him as a snake trying to spread his poison in her life, or if she meets a new character who is worried about her, the snake cannot reach a dream The married woman feels all this panic, unless he has a history of dealing with this type of colored people, and it has hurt him badly. You may feel remorse after allowing this woman to enter your home and know every little thing in your life and between you and your husband. Perhaps you should To abandon your pride and face yourself honestly. Is it the mere presence of another woman in your husbandâ€™s life that pushed him away from you in the past period, or did your absence in his life give another girl the opportunity to penetrate his life? The heart of life that has kept him far from you. The snake is very soft and twisted and can express the temptation of a partner and does not find in front of him the shield of love and tenderness that a woman is supposed to give to her husband, so he is forced to follow her on the path she has traveled as she crawls while the dreamer is still busy with other things. It is possible that she is It expresses the distorted beliefs of the seer, and there are those who tried to convince her of them away from the teachings of the Islamic religion, which pushed her to the path of no return. Seeing a snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow snake for married people. title: Interpretation of a dream about honey bees by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about honey bees in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen, because of its many interpretations and repercussions in a dream, it is one of the favorite foods for many people, whether old or young, and honey is the only food that does not spoil if it is original or natural. A person can see in his dream that he is eating honey or buying it and searches for an interpretation of this vision, which carries many different meanings and associations that differ depending on the position of the deity, which will be determined through this article. . Follow us. See also: Piano in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about honey in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about honey bees in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. There are many indications of seeing honey in a dream, which are as follows: Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing honey in a dream is a sign of peace and tolerance between people. The vision of a person eating honey with his partner is a vision of getting rid of all the problems and disagreements that occur between them and another person. A person is at the beginning of a new era and life. In addition to eating bee honey with a piece of unleavened bread in a dream, this is evidence that he will find a new job or a big business from which he will earn a lot of endless money. Also, the purer and more natural the bee honey is, the stronger the vision will be. In its positive aspect. The interpretation of bees and honey also shows that the dreamer almost obtains an inheritance from a woman who will move to Godâ€™s mercy in the family and this vision takes a quantity of honey from inside the hive. This vision also shows that the dreamer has positive and strong energy and has many goals in his life and will be able To achieve these goals soon. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a dream about pregnancy for a virgin girl in a dreamInterpretation of seeing buying honey in a dream After knowing the interpretation of dreaming about honey in a dream, as in the case of the dreamer buying honey in a dream, it is a vision that indicates the repayment of the debt that the dreamer is suffering from, in addition to To a vision that shows winning a lot of money if the person works in trade. Also, if the dreamer sells honey in a dream, this is a vision that shows that this person has many high abilities. If an unmarried girl sees herself buying an amount of honey, this vision indicates This girl will receive money equal to the honey she bought in a dream. If a person buys honey in a dream, this vision is evidence that he is suffering from great financial distress at that time, and that he will be able to get rid of it, and God knows best. See also: Daydreams of seeing honey in Dream: If the dreamer tastes honey in a dream, this indicates that he is approaching marriage to a beautiful woman if he is single. If someone gets married, this vision shows that his wife loves him very much and always tries to get close to him. Many people search for the interpretation of a dream about honey in a dream, and also if someone sees Once he has a quantity of honey and eats it while enjoying it, this vision is a sign that this person will meet one of his travelers and relatives. title: Interpretation of seeing a hurricane in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a black tornado for a single woman: A black tornado in a dream symbolizes the challenges that single people will face in the coming days, especially if its size is large. Seeing a person escaping from a black tornado in a dream and going to a girl means that he needs help and asks her for support. If the face of the black tornado hits in This dream indicates the death of heartache and sadness, God willing. The girlâ€™s inability to escape from the tornado in the dream indicates disagreements with her friend and her search for a way to reconcile with her. The motherâ€™s request to the girl to protect her from the black tornado in the dream shows the motherâ€™s great love for her. If A tornado hit a friend in a dream, this indicates that this friend longs for the girl he dreams about. Seeing a large tornado approaching to swallow the separated house warns of many problems surrounding it. Seeing a tornado in a dream for a married woman Seeing a tornado hitting a womanâ€™s husband in a dream is a warning that Something bad will happen to her or her husband. A huge tornado in a dream is an unpleasant vision, because it symbolizes a lot of worries. Escaping from a tornado in a dream is good news to get rid of worries. The husband being hit by a tornado is a sign of the financial crisis that will befall him. The tornado indicates that the woman has overpaid. Thinking about her life and feeling afraid of the coming days. If a woman is hurt by a hurricane in a dream, it is an indication of the abundant livelihood that she will have soon. Seeing someone being hit by a hurricane is a sign of goodness and strength that befalls the woman. Seeing her escaping from the hurricane means that a married woman She will do her best to protect her home and family from danger. Interpretation of seeing a tornado in a dream: A black tornado in a dream symbolizes many obstacles. The vision warns the dreamer against facing challenges and difficulties on his way to achieving his goals. The vision is a message to the pioneer that he must complete his steps and not give in to the obstacles that he will overcome. Riding through a tornado unscathed in a dream. The complex of overcoming all difficulties, achieving goals and achieving what you want. If you see a tornado with fire in a dream, this means that many changes will happen soon. Seeing a tornado of fire indicates crises that the dreamer is going through. Interpretation of seeing a tornado in a dream. Seeing a strong wind vortex in The dream indicates a period full of dangers and difficulties that the dreamer will soon experience. The vision indicates many obstacles at work. The vision warns of problems and crises that afflict the dreamer with anxiety. Escaping from a whirlwind in a dream heralds the energy and strength that the dreamer possesses. Interpretation of seeing a sea storm In a dream, a hurricane at sea in a dream warns of negative changes occurring to the pioneer. Watching a hurricane crossing the sea in a dream announces the arrival of abundant goods and the acquisition of money. The novelistâ€™s inability to overcome the whirlwind is an indication of his fear of facing problems. The vision symbolizes the crises into which the dreamer enters. Seeing a hurricane in a dream indicates an illness affecting the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a storm at sea. Seeing a large storm at sea like a hurricane indicates a major crisis that has caused...

title: Interpretation of dreams about falling from a plane in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about falling from a plane in a dream is one of the very disturbing dreams that anyone can see in a dream and wants to know its meaning and interpretations, so let us learn all these interpretations in detail today. Interpretation of dreams about falling from a plane in a dream If a divorced woman sees that her ex-husband is riding with her in the same plane, this is evidence of her lack of self-confidence and her need for confidence. Dreaming that you are riding a plane with a divorced man in a dream is a sign of the instability that the woman was living in at that time. Dreaming of riding a plane with a divorced man is a sign of communicating with her ex-husband and repairing their relationship. The dream of riding a plane in a dream with a divorced man indicates that the woman will soon marry her divorced husband or another man. Interpretation of a dream about driving a plane with a dead person in a dream Anyone who dreams that he is driving his plane with the dead while talking to them, this is a sign that the dreamer will travel soon. The dream of riding a plane with a dead person in a dream is a sign of the long journey that the dreamer will suffer and be away from his family. Seeing yourself traveling with the dead in a dream is evidence of the long life that the dreamer enjoys. Dreaming of driving a plane with the dead in a dream is evidence of the enormous livelihood that The dreamer will get it. Interpretation of a dream of riding a plane with someone you love in a dreamWhoever sees in a dream that he boarded a plane with someone close to him, this is evidence of the fulfillment of desires and dreams at that time. A young manâ€™s dream of riding a plane with someone he loves in a dream is a sign of his success in life and his proximity to business trips. When a married woman dreams that she is traveling by plane with some of her loved ones, this is evidence of her good arrival in life and the fulfillment of her desires. Seeing an ordinary girl boarding a plane with someone she loves in a dream is evidence of her proximity to marrying a young man with high morals. Interpretation of dreams of a plane falling in front of me and not exploding in a dreamWhoever sees in a dream that a plane is falling in front of him and does not explode, this is a sign of a big problem that you will face soon, but it will be solved soon. When you see a plane crashing and not exploding in a dream, this is an indication of the sins and sins that the dreamer commits, and this will happen soon. The plane fell in a dream and did not explode, indicating its ability to overcome crises and difficulties in the coming period. If a person sees that a plane fell in a dream and did not explode, this is an indication of the psychological crises he is going through and that he will get rid of soon. Interpretation of a dream of a plane landing in the house in a dreamWhoever dreams that A plane landing in her house indicates the coming good for the people of the house in the coming period. A dream of a plane landing in the house in a dream is a sign of the return of the traveler and expatriate to his family. Seeing a plane landing in a dream is a sign of the arrival of abundant good for the people of this house. When you see a plane over the dead in a dream, this is a sign of the high status that the head of the house will obtain. Interpretation of a dream of flying by plane in a dream If one sees that he is flying in a plane in a dream, this is a sign of joy and happiness for the person of the vision for the girl

title: Interpretation of a dream about a new house for a pregnant woman and interpretation of a dream about moving to a new house for a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a new home for a pregnant woman: Renovating a home is one of the happiest moments we experience. There is no doubt that everyone dreams of living in a spacious and beautiful home, so we seek to fulfill this desire at the beginning of lifeâ€™s journey because it is the most important thing for us, so we find that dreaming of a new home for a new home. A pregnant woman indicates happiness and joy for her, and we will learn more details during the legal majority as explained in the article. Interpretation of a dream about a new house for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of a dream about a new house for a pregnant woman? The vision expresses the dreamerâ€™s happiness in the coming days to know the gender of her child, as she knows that The gender of the fetus is male, and this makes her happy and joyful, and she hopes that the months of pregnancy will pass quickly. That she can see her child in complete health and safety. If the dreamer is at the end of her pregnancy, she should be optimistic that she will give birth easily and will not face any problems or issues that affect her health or her fetus. She will also find everyone around her during labor, and this makes her feel psychologically comfortable during this period. If the house is beautiful and spacious, this is a sign of the luxurious life that the dreamer is living and the good luck that awaits him in the future. Every time she enters a project, she finds huge profits that never decrease, but rather increase, and bring her many benefits. If there is any disagreement with the husband, this dream portends that any problem with him will disappear, and that she will live with him with love, understanding, and respect, and if she has children They will be happy to live a very happy life. Understanding the family. The dreamer must take care of the memory of God Almighty at all times as there is no doubt that she is in dire need of her Lordâ€™s care from any crisis she faces in her life or from any pain she feels during pregnancy and after childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about a new house for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that this dream is one of the happy dreams that heralds the dreamerâ€™s days full of goodness and blessings, especially if the house is large and spacious and she is happy to have him in it. She should always thank her Lord for this generosity that changes her life for the most beautiful. The dreamer's exit from a narrow house to a house much wider than this indicates the ample sustenance and great comfort that she finds at this stage of her life, as she enters into projects that make her achieve unexpected gains as a result of her tremendous success. The vision expresses facing any problem and her ability to solve it in a timely manner without running into any harmful obstacles in her life. This makes her always smile and not be sad no matter what she encounters in her life. If the dreamer really desires to live in a new home and has been asking for the fulfillment of this desire for a long time, This indicates that her Lord has heard her pleas to Him and will fulfill her desire very soon. But if the new home is not suitable for the dreamer and she does not feel comfortable in it, then she must seek help from her Lord in all matters of her life and not neglect supplication or doing good deeds that will save her from any harm. . In this world and the hereafter. Does the dream confuse you and you cannot find an explanation that reassures you? Search via Google on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website. title: Interpretation of seeing beef liver in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing cow liver in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through a website.visionroy2a.com Due to the difference in the interpretation of cow liver in a dream from one world to another, we will talk about the interpretation of this vision for a single girl and a married woman. And a pregnant woman, a man and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing beef liver in a dream for a single girl: Seeing beef liver in a dream for an unmarried girl is an indication of achieving her goals and ambitions and assuming an important position. Seeing a single girl in a dream preparing beef liver is a sign that brings goodness and abundant food. Seeing someone offering liver For another person in a dream, an indication of the strength of their relationship and their short relationship with each other. Seeing a single girl preparing liver and arranging it in a dream is a sign of great hostility with her family and friends. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cow being beaten in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing cow liver in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a woman A married woman preparing raw liver in a dream indicates the many disputes and problems in her life and her attempt to solve them and stabilize her marital life. Seeing a married woman offering liver to her husband is a sign of their intense love for each other and their long struggle together to secure their future. Seeing a married woman eating liver in a dream is an indication of the good upbringing of her children and their high status in education. See also: Interpretation of seeing a cowâ€™s breast in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a man eating liver in a dream: Seeing a hungry man eating liver in a dream is a sign of accomplishing all difficult tasks with his work to the fullest and obtaining great rewards. Watching a man preparing a plate of liver is an indication that he is suffering from many problems. Of fears and that they will be resolved soon without the help of others. See also: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Baqarah in a dream Interpretation of seeing eating liver in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman eating liver in a dream is an indication that she experienced health problems during pregnancy, and if she ate the entire dish, it will end soon. From all her problems. Seeing a pregnant woman preparing several dishes of liver that she offers to her husband indicates the provision of fair children, her good fortune in life, and happiness and goodness in them. See also: Interpretation of seeing a yellow cow in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man eating liver in a dream: Seeing a young man eating liver in The dreamer is not satisfied, then this is a sign of his effort to find a suitable job for him. Dreaming about eating a whole liver is a sign of the dreamerâ€™s success in achieving all his dreams and aspirations. Seeing a young man eating raw liver in a dream is an indication of facing some difficulties and problems in his life and work. Seeing a young man eating a delicious liver in a dream is a signification However, it opens the doors of livelihood for the monarch and engages in great work. Seeing a young man eating a lot of liver in a dream is a sign of the presence of bad friends in his life and he must be warned against them. See also: Interpretation of seeing a black cow in a dream What is the interpretation of a dream about eating black liver in a dream: Seeing yourself Eating black liver in a dream is a zodiac sign to create good relationships in his life that will help him achieve his dreams and ambitions. Seeing black liver in a dream has a meaning.

title: Interpretation of a dream about selling vegetables in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about selling vegetables in a dream. Scientists have put forward different concepts of what this means. Interpretation of a dream about selling vegetables in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I sell vegetables in a dream can indicate recovery, God willing. If a sick person is seen selling vegetables, it may indicate his recovery from the disease, and God knows the unseen. Except that some Scientists have mentioned that selling vegetables can lead to distress and sadness, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees himself selling vegetables in a dream, this may be an indication of anxiety as much as the amount of vegetables, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about selling gold bullion in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about selling gold bullion in a dream can indicate To get rid of problems, God willing. When the dreamer sees that he is selling gold bullion, it may relieve him of his worries, and God knows best. If a married woman sees gold bullion, then she may express anxiety and sorrow, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself pulling gold bullion from the ground, this may indicate that he will enter into... A difficult task, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about selling an old car in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about selling an old car in a dream can lead to staying away from bad friends, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself selling an old car in a dream, this may indicate paying off debts, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Likewise, If a married man sees himself selling an old car in a dream, this may indicate recovery, God willing. If a young man sees himself in a dream selling a car, this may be a sign of lost opportunities, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that I sell sheep in a dreamInterpretation of a dream that I sell sheep in a dream It can indicate things that are not good, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees sheep selling in a dream, this may be a sign of loss, and God knows the unseen. When you see sheep being sold, this can lead to discontent, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a young man is seen selling a sheep in a dream, he may express About his exposure to trouble and loss, and God is Most High, Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about selling a workplace in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about selling a workplace in a dream. Perhaps selling in a store will lead to good, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees selling in a store, it may be evidence of sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees selling in a store, then It reflects the success of projects, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a sale may indicate the benefit of the dreamer, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of selling childrenâ€™s clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of selling childrenâ€™s clothes in a dream. We did not find clear meanings in the interpretation books to see that. However, seeing a married woman wearing childrenâ€™s clothes in A dream can be evidence of pregnancy and childbirth, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself buying childrenâ€™s clothes, this may lead to goodness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl is seen buying childrenâ€™s clothes, this may represent marriage, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about selling silver in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about selling silver in a dream can It leads to failure, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself selling silver in a dream, this may be a defeat, and God knows best. When you see a single girl selling silver, it may lead to failure.

This dream may indicate the desire to meet the Most High, Blessed God and get closer to Him. To see yourself running in the funeral in a dream may indicate the dreamerâ€™s sadness and extreme fear, And God knows best. title: Interpretation of dreams about collecting gold from the ground for single women

preview.html: But the meaning can be either hatred or praise for this vision, as we will explain to you today through the following lines provided by your website gptafser.com/, so follow us.Interpretation of the vision of collecting gold from the ground in a dream for a single girlWhen an unmarried girl dreams that she is collecting gold from the ground In the dream. This indicates that she will attain many good things, and that she will marry a wealthy man, and God knows best. The vision may indicate that the dreamer acquires a large inheritance without making any effort, and God knows best. Seeing an unmarried girl picking up gold from the ground and it was in the form of a pen in The dream. Evidence that she is a good girl, characterized by good qualifications, good education, and high morals, and God knows best. A vision of extracting gold from the ground in a dream for an unmarried girl. It is a metaphor for hearing good news or a positive change in her life, and God knows best. A girl sees herself picking up gold from the ground in front of her house. In a dream, she is happy. It is a good sign that the fortuneteller will get the job she wants, and God knows best. In the event that an unmarried girl gets a gold ring from the ground in a dream. It symbolizes marriage to a good man in the near future, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of the dream By finding gold. Interpretation of seeing gold collected from the ground in a dream for a married woman. A married woman sees herself starting to collect gold from the ground in a dream. It is considered a good sign of pregnancy, and that she will give birth to a boy, God willing. A married woman has children of marriageable age and dreams of seeing herself picking up gold from the ground. In a dream. It means that one of her children will get married soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman collecting gold in a dream with her husband and taking it out of the ground in a dream. It is a metaphor for the great love hidden in her husbandâ€™s heart for her. It also indicates the enjoyment of insight into marital life and her sense of stability, and God knows best. Woman. A married woman watches herself picking up gold from the ground and finds a beautiful necklace. She is happy with it and wears it in a dream. For her, the dream is a good omen that she will enter a good job through which she will achieve everything she desires in her life, and God knows best. Either a married woman picked up a gold ring while picking up gold from the ground in a dream. The vision means that he will be in power soon and will receive a lot of money and affection. Seeing a gold chain in a dream for a married woman indicates her love for her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about collecting gold from the ground for a man and its meaning. A man dreams of himself picking up gold from the ground in a dream. This means that the dreamer He will face a big problem in his life. It may be a reason for changing the form and path of his life, and God knows best. Either a man dreams of collecting gold from the ground and finds himself sad in the dream. It is a sign of his approaching death, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. And in the event that the man sees himself collecting gold from the land of an authority figure In the state during his sleep. The vision means that the dreamer has the prestige and power of that person, and God knows best. A vision of collecting gold and extracting it from the ground in a dream for a man. What proves the obligation of paying zakat on behalf of himself and his family, and God knows best. As for the man who is watching, he is withdrawing gold bullion from Earth in a dream. This indicates that soon

It is a sign of his approaching death, and God is the Most High, the All-Knowing. And in the event that the man sees himself collecting gold from the land of an authority figure In the state during his sleep. The vision means that the dreamer has the prestige and power of that person, and God knows best. A vision of collecting gold and extracting it from the ground in a dream for a man. What proves the obligation of paying zakat on behalf of himself and his family, and God knows best. As for the man who is watching, he is withdrawing gold bullion from Earth in a dream.
